name: reseq12i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: eqtri(cres(c0, c1), cres(c2, c3), cres(c2, c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cres(c0, c1), cres(c2, c3))
-| wceq(cres(c0, c1), cres(c2, c1))
-| wceq(cres(c2, c1), cres(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cres(c0, c1), cres(c2, c3))
-| wceq(cres(c0, c1), cres(c2, c1))
-| wceq(cres(c2, c1), cres(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cres(c0, c1), cres(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cres(c0, c1), cres(c2, c3))
-| wceq(cres(c2, c1), cres(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cres(c2, c1), cres(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c1, c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cres(c0, c1), cres(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)

comment: Equality inference for restrictions. (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2014.)
